price: 106. Los desdichados entrarán al fuego, donde exhalarán fuertes quejidos y respirarán con dificultad.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna shaqū fafī al-nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīqun
